reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m really happy with the cameras !!
reviews.reviewText: They have good connectivity, good resolution, the solar panel and the battery work wonderfully, I bought two first and then a third and they have helped me a lot on my property! I recommend them 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this camera!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great! Very easy to hook up to the app, and also easy to install. I love the fact that it's solar powered too instead of something we have to take down and charge constantly. The picture is nice and clear on it. Def worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This works well.
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to set up and it works well. It captures clear images both day and night. I found it pretty easy to set up and drill into the wall of my house. The app is easy to set up and use. I can check on things any time I want. I get notified when motion is detected and so no matter where I am, I know what's going on. The best part is that I installed it and I can forget about it as it's solar charged and doesn't need batteries or cables to be connected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ever-Watchful Solar Sentinel: Adding Sunshine to Security and Sparkle to Surveillance!
reviews.reviewText: I have to tell you, setting up the Rebluum 2K Solar Security Camera was like hosting a welcoming party for a Martian rover. My backyard turned into a landing site for this extraterrestrial sentinel – packing some serious tech chops beneath its 'out-of-this-world' design. First things first, the camera speaks fluent 'Wireless' with a strong accent in '2.4Ghz WiFi.' The only cords you'll see here are the metaphorical ones attaching you to peace of mind. This little beauty loves nothing more than to chat with your router all day, sharing what it sees with seamless clarity.This sunny sentinel is a true green-thumbs-up for Mother Nature! Powered by our friendly neighborhood star – the Sun – it slurps up the rays by day and keeps a vigilant eye by night. It’s like a solar-powered owl that’s traded hunting mice for spotting mischief. Now, let's talk about its nocturnal vision. I switched off the lights and BOOM, my garden was drenched in an eerie, but reassuring glow. The Color Night Vision is like having a friendly raccoon that never sleeps, always alert and ready to squeal (or, you know, send alerts to your phone) at the slightest whiff of trouble.The motion detection feature is as keen as a border collie on espresso. It's smart, attentive, and doesn't waste time barking up the wrong tree. With precise and accurate alerts, you won't be bothered by false alarms set off by those rebellious autumn leaves blowing across your yard. What’s better than a security camera? A security camera with a voice, of course! The two-way audio turns this camera into the ultimate communicator. Whether you want to greet the delivery guy, startle a potential trespasser, or just remind your spouse they promised to water the plants - your voice now has range and reach!With the SD Card and Cloud Service, it's like having a personal scribe, diligently jotting down everything it sees, ready to replay at your whim. No more worrying about running out of memory - this Martian marvel has enough room to store your very own backyard soap opera. All in all, the Rebluum 2K Solar Security Camera is a perfect blend of advanced tech and eco-friendliness, acting as a faithful watchdog for your property, but without the slobber. Whether you're home or away, day or night, this camera shines as a beacon of safety, powered by the very star that nurtures life on our planet. Now that’s what I call bringing light to security!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to run
reviews.reviewText: As a 78 year old, and pretty ignorant about technology and cell phones, I am impressed with the ease of use of this security camera. I was concerned that the batteries would not be sufficient to last the night. But after the first couple of nights of use, there was absolutely no problem. Even in early April with longer nights, and short days, there was no shortage of power. I do live in the high desert, so the quality of sunlight is no problem. The angle of view is able to cover from the front door, the drive way, and to the edge of the street about 35 feet away. I did not set it for human detection, we get a lot of wildlife such as deer, horses, racoons, and even the occasional bear. I was interested in watching their activity. I wanted to be notified for any movement. I get notified with automobile passage, but we get so little traffic, that is not a problem. The night vision is very clear to at least 40 feet, which covers to the edge of the property. I have had no reason to use the two way audio, but I did test it, and I am sure any nefarious people would depart immediately when challenged. The wireless connection was the hardest part for me, I was not familiar with networks, and WiFi. Luckily, the next door neighbors son came over, and had me up and running in no time. He said I needed to connect 2.4. I am not using the cloud storage, just the memory card, which is working flawlessly. The quality of video is amazing in both day and night. The night capability is good enough, that I believe the identification of an individual would be possible from a significant distance. This is the security camera for the novice technical guy. No complicated wiring, and once the settings are made, it pretty much runs itself. I strongly recommend this camera for the value for money. I am showing it, and recommending it, to the neighbors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great addition to my home
reviews.reviewText: I have had this unit up for several weeks now, and it performs perfectly. The app setup on my phone was quick and easy, and the adjustable sensitivity makes sure that I don't miss anything without being bothered all the time by false alerts.Installation was very simple and straight forward, and the solar panel has kept the battery charged to 100% at all times. I highly recommend this unit for anyone who wants a dependable outdoor security camera that never has to be taken down for charging!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice security camera to own
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little security camera for outdoors. There are several features that I truly like. The ability to not have to charge. It is wonderful. I wish everything had solar panels attached to them. This outdoor security camera gives you the ability to have two way communication, which is definitely a plus. You also have the ability to pan and tilt which gives you a much greater range to view and keep secure. This camera has night vision and the ability to store, images and videos on an SD card or directly to a cloud. This camera is easy to install and easy to set up as well. Love.
